/* file : ConsultingMapper.xml, id : getConsultingList */ SELECT C.* , CON_TYPE.CODE_NAME AS CON_TYPE_NAME , CON_CLASS.CODE_NAME AS CON_CLASS_NAME , SUPPORT_ORG.CODE_NAME AS SUPPORT_ORG_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(C.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , U.USERNAME AS REG_USERNAME FROM ST_CONSULTING C INNER JOIN ST_CODE_DTL CON_TYPE ON CON_TYPE.GRP_CODE = 'CON_TYPE' AND CON_TYPE.CODE = C.CON_TYPE INNER JOIN ST_CODE_DTL CON_CLASS ON CON_CLASS.GRP_CODE = 'CON_CLASS' AND CON_CLASS.CODE = C.CON_CLASS INNER JOIN ST_CODE_DTL SUPPORT_ORG ON SUPPORT_ORG.GRP_CODE = 'SUPPORT_ORG' AND SUPPORT_ORG.CODE = C.SUPPORT_ORG INNER JOIN ST_USER U ON C.REG_USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ WHERE C.DEL_FLAG = 0
AND C.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY READ_CNT DESC, CON_SEQ DESC /*||ORDER BY READ_CNT DESC, CON_SEQ DESC||*/
ORDER BY CON_SEQ DESC /*||ORDER BY CON_SEQ DESC||*/
